test_cases.name: verify
test_cases.description: Case: one lite block, 8 validators, no error

test_cases.name: verify
test_cases.description: Case: one lite block, 128 validators, no error

test_cases.name: verify
test_cases.description: Case: one lite block, empty validator set, expects error
expected_output: expected new header validators () to match those that were supplied (944DCAE5C1B65F66D232DCF57CC485CEBF8B7EAFEE7CC2F123102E313DCE6EE0)

test_cases.name: verify
test_cases.description: Case: two lite blocks, validator set grows twice (2 + 2), no error

test_cases.name: verify
test_cases.description: Case: two lite blocks, validator set reduces to half, no error

test_cases.name: verify
test_cases.description: Case: two lite blocks, 1/3 validator set changes, no error

test_cases.name: verify
test_cases.description: Case: two lite blocks, 1/2 validator set changes, no error

test_cases.name: verify
test_cases.description: Case: two lite blocks, 2/3 validator set changes, no error

test_cases.name: verify
test_cases.description: Case: two lite blocks, validator set changes completely, no error

test_cases.name: verify
test_cases.description: Case: two lite blocks, less than 1/3 validator set changes, no error

test_cases.name: verify
test_cases.description: Case: two lite blocks, more than 2/3 validator set changes, no error

test_cases.name: verify
test_cases.description: Case: one lite block, wrong proposer, with error

test_cases.name: verify
test_cases.description: Case: one lite block, wrong validator set, with error
expected_output: expected our validators (9119FA9ADED96047540185FEEF96430A383152E0530137CB6165666CAB493423) to match those from new header (A6F1A36E8895EC84E86DCD70D04E6D8A014009590CFD3BD4386A753DFCEA6B8E)

test_cases.name: verify
test_cases.description: Case: one lite block, empty commit, with error
expected_output: h2.ValidateBasic failed: signedHeader missing commit (precommit votes)

test_cases.name: verify
test_cases.description: Case: one lite block, wrong header hash, with error
expected_output: h2.ValidateBasic failed: signedHeader commit signs block 77726F6E672068656164657220686173682121, header is block 98CBC7A99CB4807999DE2994ABE42B4E6859E8E72867C27B129640670DC64AB6

test_cases.name: verify
test_cases.description: Case: one lite block, wrong PartsHeader.Total, with error
expected_output: invalid commit -- insufficient old voting power: got 0.00, needed more than 33.00

test_cases.name: verify
test_cases.description: Case: one lite block, wrong PartsHeader.Hash, with error
expected_output: invalid commit -- insufficient old voting power: got 0.00, needed more than 33.00

test_cases.name: verify
test_cases.description: Case: one lite block, wrong vote type, with error
expected_output: h2.ValidateBasic failed: commit.ValidateBasic failed during SignedHeader.ValidateBasic: Invalid commit vote. Expected precommit, got 1

test_cases.name: verify
test_cases.description: Case: one lite block, wrong vote height, with error
expected_output: h2.ValidateBasic failed: signedHeader header and commit height mismatch: 2 vs 1

test_cases.name: verify
test_cases.description: Case: one lite block, wrong vote round, with error
expected_output: Invalid commit -- invalid signature: Vote{0:015CE1420A50 2/00/2(Precommit) 98CBC7A99CB4 42E18D83DCB2 @ 2019-11-02T15:04:15Z}

test_cases.name: verify
test_cases.description: Case: one lite block, wrong vote BlockID, with error
expected_output: Invalid commit -- invalid signature: Vote{0:015CE1420A50 2/01/2(Precommit) 77726F6E6720 42E18D83DCB2 @ 2019-11-02T15:04:15Z}

test_cases.name: verify
test_cases.description: Case: one lite block, wrong vote timestamp, with error
expected_output: Invalid commit -- invalid signature: Vote{0:015CE1420A50 2/01/2(Precommit) 98CBC7A99CB4 42E18D83DCB2 @ 2019-11-02T15:04:05Z}

test_cases.name: verify
test_cases.description: Case: one lite block, wrong signature in vote, with error
expected_output: Invalid commit -- invalid signature: Vote{0:015CE1420A50 2/01/2(Precommit) 98CBC7A99CB4 77726F6E6720 @ 2019-11-02T15:04:15Z}

test_cases.name: verify
test_cases.description: Case: one lite block, invalid signature in vote, with error
expected_output: Invalid commit -- invalid signature: Vote{1:015CE1420A50 2/01/2(Precommit) 8A9301A9F5CA BD2AE8029FD1 @ 2019-11-02T15:04:15Z}

test_cases.name: verify
test_cases.description: Case: one lite block, one-third vals don't sign, expects error
expected_output: invalid commit -- insufficient old voting power: got 100.00, needed more than 100.00

test_cases.name: verify
test_cases.description: Case: one lite block, less than one-third vals don't sign, no error

test_cases.description: Case: one lite block, empty header, with error
